DEMO_430_MSG_010:
́Attention! I've got an urgent matter to discuss 
with you lot today!
DEMO_430_MSG_020:
́As you know, our Lord, the Dark Master, will be paying us a visit today!
ā
DEMO_430_MSG_030: ́However... some rather bad news has made it's way back to me!
DEMO_430_MSG_040:
́A "rat" has made their way into the Bastille! They're aiming to destroy our Remodeling Device!
ā
DEMO_430_MSG_050: ́With such an important visit approaching me, I am left with little choice... I must consider every possibility!
DEMO_430_MSG_060:
́Could one of my own, perhaps, be this backstabbing spy?
As I said, anything is possible, and must be considered!
DEMO_430_MSG_200:
́No, that is no longer important! I'll do what I should've done back then, all those years ago!
ā
DEMO_430_MSG_100:
́U-Unbelievable... sleeping on the job!
How dare you make a mockery out of me!
DEMO_430_MSG_110:
́Listen up! We need to iron out this situation before
our Lord, the Dark Master, makes his appearance here!
DEMO_430_MSG_130: ́Hmm? I haven't seen your face around here before... in fact, I'd remember making one of your kind a jailer around here...
DEMO_430_MSG_140: ́Is that right... you're saying perhaps I'm just not thinking straight under all this stress?
DEMO_430_MSG_150:
́That sound... what was that sound just now? 
It sounded just like fabric being torn open...
ā
DEMO_430_MSG_160:
́Hah! You ignorant fool... you're wearing a disguise! 
Take that disguse off and reveal yourself this instant!
DEMO_430_MSG_190:
́What are you doing here!? How did you manage to
escape from your prison!?
DEMO_430_MSG_210:
́Don't think that you'll escape my clutches... 
I, the Great King of Torture, Itaburu!
DEMO_430_MSG_220: ́Halt! Resistance is futile at this point!
DEMO_430_MSG_240:
́I won't let you get away... not this time! 
It's time to test out our recently remodeled Break Monsters!
ā
DEMO_430_MSG_250:
́This will ensure they're ready for our Lord's arrival!
Hurry, you imbeciles! Go and capture Anses at once!
